title: No Download After Prompt
body:
Long time lurker, first time poster!

After logging in to the current client, I was greeted with a prompt welcoming and encouraging me to download the alpha client. Without a second thought, I opted to download the alpha client. However, after this prompt disappeared, no download began. I tried restarting the current client, as well as my computer, but the prompt did not reappear; nor did a download begin.

Any help would be fantastic! Thanks!

replies.body:
On the top right corner of the site, click:
  your summoner name > settings > pre-release testing

I hope you like it!
